In 2022, Veradigm continued its focus on 
listening to and learning from associates’ 
views of the company culture. Associates 
most often choose words such as inclusive, 
collaborative, diverse, friendly, and family  
to describe the culture. Veradigm takes 
great pride in how associates view the 
culture today, and we believe there are 
always opportunities for growth.
Insightful Impact
6
